column4: does anybody know how to get windows media working in firefox
i installed mozilla mplayer n doesnt work for me Daverocks
did you install all of the codecs?  If I remember correctly, wmv is not in the prepackaged group of codecs.
theres a codec pack you can download if my memory serves me correctly... dont remember offhand what it's called, or where to get it, but if you google for mplayer codec wmv, it should come up.
